cells.data: -- isMaybe :: a -> Boolon isMaybe(x)	if class of x is record then		set ca to current application		set v to ((ca's NSDictionary's ¬			dictionaryWithDictionary:x)'s ¬			objectForKey:"type")		v is not missing value ¬			and (v's isKindOfClass:(ca's NSString)) ¬			and (v as string = "Maybe")	else	  false	end ifend isMaybe
